column2: News;Poipet: a body was found in a guesthouse and reported to police at 7:30 am on September 3
column3: 2018.------The victim was a Thai man who appeared to have hanged himself in  guesthouse in Kbal Spean I
column6: Banteay Meanchey province. The victim is still unidentified and the cause for this suicide is as yet unknown.------http://www.arey-news.com/archives/257737------
